schema.name: Ginisang Upo

recipeInstructions.text: First, prepare the ingredients: Finely chop the tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Set aside.
In a pan, heat a bit of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and onion, cooking until they become fragrant and slightly translucent, about 3 minutes.
Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook until they are soft, about 5 minutes.
Cut the uncooked upo (bottle gourd) into bite-sized pieces and add them to the pan. Stir well to combine with the tomato mixture.
Season with salt. Cover the pan and let it simmer until the upo is tender, approximately 10 minutes.

schema.description: Ginisang Upo is a delightfully healthy and low-carb dish that fits perfectly into any health-conscious diet. Its low sodium and sugar content make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to maintain a balanced lifestyle. This dish is part of our Healthy Recipes collection, designed to offer nutritious yet delicious options to your meals.
